Techmiljardärens ledarskapstips - så styr du ett snabbväxande bolag
Som vd gjorde Fredrik Wester Paradox Interactive till ett mångmiljardbolag. Hör hans tre viktigaste ledarskapstips.
05 Nov 2019, 14:02 by David Levin

The tech billionaire's leadership tips - how to manage a fast-growing company
As CEO, Fredrik Wester made Paradox Interactive a multi-billion company. Hear his three most important leadership tips.
05 Nov 2019, 14:02 by David Levin
